mapper.sql: t.id, t.create_by AS "createBy.id", t.create_date, t.update_by AS "updateBy.id", t.update_date, t.del_flag, t.remarks, t.credit_code, t.enterprise_name, t.enterprise_type, t.legal_representative, t.registered_capital, t.establishment_date, t.business_start, t.business_end, t.registration_authority, t.approval_date, t.registration_status, t.domicile, t.manage_scope
